name: fullstackpart3
description: This is for the exercies of the part 3 of que Fullstack Open course
author: Diego Zapata

scripts.build:ui: rmdir /s /q dist && cd ..\Fullstack\Part2\phonebook && npm run build && xcopy /E /I dist ..\..\..\FullstackPart3\dist
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
scripts.build:ui: rmdir /s /q dist && cd ..\PhonebookApp\phonebook-frontend && npm run build && xcopy /E /I dist ..\..\PhonebookAppMain\dist
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
